### The files included in this folder come from the treeppl repository.


## Tree inference

model from https://github.com/treeppl/treeppl/blob/main/models/tree-inference/tree_inference_pruning.tppl

data from https://github.com/treeppl/treeppl/blob/main/models/tree-inference/data/testdata_tree_inference_pruning.json


## Host repertoire

model from https://github.com/treeppl/treeppl/blob/main/models/host-repertoire-evolution/flat-root-prior-HRM.tppl

data from https://github.com/treeppl/treeppl/blob/main/models/host-repertoire-evolution/data/testdata_flat-root-prior-HRM.json
